function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Modelling assumption based on incomplete understanding of disease transmission","Impact":"Inaccurate risk assessment and ineffective mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Regular updates to the model based on new research and insights","Technologies":"","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"},{"Description":"Dependence on assumptions about disease transmission mechanisms","Impact":"Inadequate preparation for new disease transmission mechanisms","Mitigation":"Conducting extensive research to understand different transmission mechanisms","Technologies":"","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Retrofitting existing microscopic crowd models without considering specific disease transmission characteristics","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling results and ineffective risk assessment","Mitigation":"Developing specific models for different disease transmission characteristics","Technologies":"Microscopic crowd modeling tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
